# Enterprise Platform Architecture Specification (EPAS)

> Standards and patterns for building enterprise-grade multi-tenant SaaS applications.

## Quick Start
- Overview: /Enterprise_MultiPlatform_Architecture_Scaffold.md
- v1.4 Planning: /1.4 Planning/

## Architecture
- Full Specification: /Enterprise_MultiPlatform_Architecture_Scaffold.md

## Key Sections (in main spec)
- Core Principles: Section 1
- Security Architecture: Section 15
- Authentication & Authorization: Section 16
- API Standards: Section 17
- Event-Driven Architecture: Section 18
- Observability: Section 19
- AI Agent Safety: Section 20
- Developer Experience: Section 21
